00601 00602 /* The following EXC_RETURN values are saved the LR on exception entry */ 00603 #define EXC_RETURN_HANDLER (0xFFFFFFF1UL) /* return to Handler mode, uses MSP after return */ 00604 #define EXC_RETURN_THREAD_MSP (0xFFFFFFF9UL) /* return to Thread mode, uses MSP after return */ 00605 #define EXC_RETURN_THREAD_PSP (0xFFFFFFFDUL) /* return to Thread mode, uses PSP after return */ 00606 00607 00608 /* Interrupt Priorities are WORD accessible only under Armv6-M */ 00609 /* The following MACROS handle generation of the register offset and byte masks */ 00610 #define _BIT_SHIFT(IRQn) ( ((((uint32_t)(int32_t)(IRQn)) ) & 0x03UL) * 8UL) 00611 #define _SHP_IDX(IRQn) ( (((((uint32_t)(int32_t)(IRQn)) & 0x0FUL)-8UL) >> 2UL) ) 00612 #define _IP_IDX(IRQn) ( (((uint32_t)(int32_t)(IRQn)) >> 2UL) ) 00613 00614 #define __NVIC_SetPriorityGrouping(X) (void)(X) 00615 #define __NVIC_GetPriorityGrouping() (0U) 00616 00623 __STATIC_INLINE void __NVIC_EnableIRQ(IRQn_Type IRQn) 00624 { 00625 if ((int32_t)(IRQn) >= 0) 00626 { 00627 __COMPILER_BARRIER(); 00628 NVIC->ISER[0U] = (uint32_t)(1UL << (((uint32_t)IRQn) & 0x1FUL)); 00629 __COMPILER_BARRIER(); 00630 } 00631 } 00632 00633 00642 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t __NVIC_GetEnableIRQ(IRQn_Type IRQn) 00643 { 00644 if ((int32_t)(IRQn) >= 0) 00645 { 00646 return((uint32_t)(((NVIC->ISER[0U] & (1UL << (((uint32_t)IRQn) & 0x1FUL))) != 0UL) ? 1UL : 0UL)); 00647 } 00648 else 00649 { 00650 return(0U); 00651 } 00652 } 00653 00654 00661 __STATIC_INLINE void __NVIC_DisableIRQ(IRQn_Type IRQn) 00662 { 00663 if ((int32_t)(IRQn) >= 0) 00664 { 00665 NVIC->ICER[0U] = (uint32_t)(1UL << (((uint32_t)IRQn) & 0x1FUL)); 00666 __DSB(); 00667 __ISB(); 00668 } 00669 } 00670 00671 00680 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t __NVIC_GetPendingIRQ(IRQn_Type IRQn) 00681 { 00682 if ((int32_t)(IRQn) >= 0) 00683 { 00684 return((uint32_t)(((NVIC->ISPR[0U] & (1UL << (((uint32_t)IRQn) & 0x1FUL))) != 0UL) ? 1UL : 0UL)); 00685 } 00686 else 00687 { 00688 return(0U); 00689 } 00690 } 00691 00692 00699 __STATIC_INLINE void __NVIC_SetPendingIRQ(IRQn_Type IRQn) 00700 { 00701 if ((int32_t)(IRQn) >= 0) 00702 { 00703 NVIC->ISPR[0U] = (uint32_t)(1UL << (((uint32_t)IRQn) & 0x1FUL)); 00704 } 00705 } 00706 00707 00714 __STATIC_INLINE void __NVIC_ClearPendingIRQ(IRQn_Type IRQn) 00715 { 00716 if ((int32_t)(IRQn) >= 0) 00717 { 00718 NVIC->ICPR[0U] = (uint32_t)(1UL << (((uint32_t)IRQn) & 0x1FUL)); 00719 } 00720 } 00721 00722 00732 __STATIC_INLINE void __NVIC_SetPriority(IRQn_Type IRQn, uint32_t priority) 00733 { 00734 if ((int32_t)(IRQn) >= 0) 00735 { 00736 NVIC->IP[_IP_IDX(IRQn)] = ((uint32_t)(NVIC->IP[_IP_IDX(IRQn)] & ~(0xFFUL << _BIT_SHIFT(IRQn))) | 00737 (((priority << (8U - __NVIC_PRIO_BITS)) & (uint32_t)0xFFUL) << _BIT_SHIFT(IRQn))); 00738 } 00739 else 00740 { 00741 SCB->SHP[_SHP_IDX(IRQn)] = ((uint32_t)(SCB->SHP[_SHP_IDX(IRQn)] & ~(0xFFUL << _BIT_SHIFT(IRQn))) | 00742 (((priority << (8U - __NVIC_PRIO_BITS)) & (uint32_t)0xFFUL) << _BIT_SHIFT(IRQn))); 00743 } 00744 } 00745 00746 00756 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t __NVIC_GetPriority(IRQn_Type IRQn) 00757 { 00758 00759 if ((int32_t)(IRQn) >= 0) 00760 { 00761 return((uint32_t)(((NVIC->IP[ _IP_IDX(IRQn)] >> _BIT_SHIFT(IRQn) ) & (uint32_t)0xFFUL) >> (8U - __NVIC_PRIO_BITS))); 00762 } 00763 else 00764 { 00765 return((uint32_t)(((SCB->SHP[_SHP_IDX(IRQn)] >> _BIT_SHIFT(IRQn) ) & (uint32_t)0xFFUL) >> (8U - __NVIC_PRIO_BITS))); 00766 } 00767 } 00768 00769 00781 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t NVIC_EncodePriority (uint32_t PriorityGroup, uint32_t PreemptPriority, uint32_t SubPriority) 00782 { 00783 uint32_t PriorityGroupTmp = (PriorityGroup & (uint32_t)0x07UL); /* only values 0..7 are used */ 00784 uint32_t PreemptPriorityBits; 00785 uint32_t SubPriorityBits; 00786 00787 PreemptPriorityBits = ((7UL - PriorityGroupTmp) > (uint32_t)(__NVIC_PRIO_BITS)) ? (uint32_t)(__NVIC_PRIO_BITS) : (uint32_t)(7UL - PriorityGroupTmp); 00788 SubPriorityBits = ((PriorityGroupTmp + (uint32_t)(__NVIC_PRIO_BITS)) < (uint32_t)7UL) ? (uint32_t)0UL : (uint32_t)((PriorityGroupTmp - 7UL) + (uint32_t)(__NVIC_PRIO_BITS)); 00789 00790 return ( 00791 ((PreemptPriority & (uint32_t)((1UL << (PreemptPriorityBits)) - 1UL)) << SubPriorityBits) | 00792 ((SubPriority & (uint32_t)((1UL << (SubPriorityBits )) - 1UL))) 00793 ); 00794 } 00795 00796 00808 __STATIC_INLINE void NVIC_DecodePriority (uint32_t Priority, uint32_t PriorityGroup, uint32_t* const pPreemptPriority, uint32_t* const pSubPriority) 00809 { 00810 uint32_t PriorityGroupTmp = (PriorityGroup & (uint32_t)0x07UL); /* only values 0..7 are used */ 00811 uint32_t PreemptPriorityBits; 00812 uint32_t SubPriorityBits; 00813 00814 PreemptPriorityBits = ((7UL - PriorityGroupTmp) > (uint32_t)(__NVIC_PRIO_BITS)) ? (uint32_t)(__NVIC_PRIO_BITS) : (uint32_t)(7UL - PriorityGroupTmp); 00815 SubPriorityBits = ((PriorityGroupTmp + (uint32_t)(__NVIC_PRIO_BITS)) < (uint32_t)7UL) ? (uint32_t)0UL : (uint32_t)((PriorityGroupTmp - 7UL) + (uint32_t)(__NVIC_PRIO_BITS)); 00816 00817 *pPreemptPriority = (Priority >> SubPriorityBits) & (uint32_t)((1UL << (PreemptPriorityBits)) - 1UL); 00818 *pSubPriority = (Priority ) & (uint32_t)((1UL << (SubPriorityBits )) - 1UL); 00819 } 00820 00821 00822 00832 __STATIC_INLINE void __NVIC_SetVector(IRQn_Type IRQn, uint32_t vector) 00833 { 00834 uint32_t *vectors = (uint32_t *)(NVIC_USER_IRQ_OFFSET << 2); /* point to 1st user interrupt */ 00835 *(vectors + (int32_t)IRQn) = vector; /* use pointer arithmetic to access vector */ 00836 /* ARM Application Note 321 states that the M0 does not require the architectural barrier */ 00837 } 00838 00839 00848 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t __NVIC_GetVector(IRQn_Type IRQn) 00849 { 00850 uint32_t *vectors = (uint32_t *)(NVIC_USER_IRQ_OFFSET << 2); /* point to 1st user interrupt */ 00851 return *(vectors + (int32_t)IRQn); /* use pointer arithmetic to access vector */ 00852 } 00853 00854 00859 __NO_RETURN __STATIC_INLINE void __NVIC_SystemReset(void) 00860 { 00861 __DSB(); /* Ensure all outstanding memory accesses included 00862 buffered write are completed before reset */ 00863 SCB->AIRCR = ((0x5FAUL << SCB_AIRCR_VECTKEY_Pos) | 00864 SCB_AIRCR_SYSRESETREQ_Msk); 00865 __DSB(); /* Ensure completion of memory access */ 00866 00867 for(;;) /* wait until reset */ 00868 { 00869 __NOP(); 00870 } 00871 } 00872 00876 /* ########################## FPU functions #################################### */ 00892 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t SCB_GetFPUType(void) 00893 { 00894 return 0U; /* No FPU */ 00895 } 00896 00897 00902 /* ################################## SysTick function ############################################ */ 00910 #if defined (__Vendor_SysTickConfig) && (__Vendor_SysTickConfig == 0U) 00911 00923 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t SysTick_Config(uint32_t ticks) 00924 { 00925 if ((ticks - 1UL) > SysTick_LOAD_RELOAD_Msk) 00926 { 00927 return (1UL); /* Reload value impossible */ 00928 } 00929 00930 SysTick->LOAD = (uint32_t)(ticks - 1UL); /* set reload register */ 00931 NVIC_SetPriority (SysTick_IRQn, (1UL << __NVIC_PRIO_BITS) - 1UL); /* set Priority for Systick Interrupt */ 00932 SysTick->VAL = 0UL; /* Load the SysTick Counter Value */ 00933 SysTick->CTRL = SysTick_CTRL_CLKSOURCE_Msk | 00934 SysTick_CTRL_TICKINT_Msk | 00935 SysTick_CTRL_ENABLE_Msk; /* Enable SysTick IRQ and SysTick Timer */ 00936 return (0UL); /* Function successful */ 00937 } 00938 00939 #endif 00940 00946 #ifdef __cplusplus 00947 } 00948 #endif 00949 00950 #endif /* __CORE_CM0_H_DEPENDANT */ 00951 00952 #endif /* __CMSIS_GENERIC */
